body_html: We don't support GPUs with compute capabilities < 3.0. As @soumith said in #686 you might not experience any speedups on such an old GPU, and it's likely better to stick to the CPU. It's probably going to work fine after your patch, but we're not going to provide support in case of any errors.

body: We don't support GPUs with compute capabilities < 3.0. As @soumith said in #686 you might not experience any speedups on such an old GPU, and it's likely better to stick to the CPU. It's probably going to work fine after your patch, but we're not going to provide support in case of any errors.
